page.title: 15THE ABATTOIR -WENT HILLS
page.content: The abattoir at Home Farm, Stapleton, is privately owned. It is not a part of the Stapleton Estate. Most of the animals that are taken there come from the local farms, and cattle markets, but some animals are brought quite long distances. On the day that we went there, some sheep had been brought over from Wales. The butchers who used the abattoir appeared to be from the nearby towns, such as Pontefract and Castleford. The cattle trucks had come from places in both North and West Yorkshire. The road system is probably the main reason for the abattoir's success.
